channel.title: Error connecting server
channel.description:
On my 508/525 codeusa server.
when new players login for the first time, it says ''error connecting server'' then you gotta click login again and then it logs in normally.
i wanna know how to take of ''error connecting server'' is there a file i need to change or something because players always think server is off so i want it to log in first time.

item.title: Error connecting server
item.dc:creator: @rudeboijaz rudeboijaz
item.description:
@rudeboijaz wrote:

On my 508/525 codeusa server.

when new players login for the first time, it says ‘‘error connecting server’’ then you gotta click login again and then it logs in normally.

i wanna know how to take of ‘‘error connecting server’’ is there a file i need to change or something because players always think server is off so i want it to log in first time.

Read full topic
